tree.name: Xavier Tillman
tree.tradeDescription: Celtics traded Tillman and $3.5M cash to Hornets to get under luxury tax. No assets sent back by Charlotte.
tree.note: Buzzer-beater deadline deal. CHA received Tillman + cash for nothing.

assetsGivenUp.name: $7M Trade Exception
assetsGivenUp.tradeDescription: Created by sending Tyus Jones to Dallas for Malaki Branham
assetsGivenUp.note: $7M traded player exception generated from Tyus Jones departure

assetsGivenUp.name: Tyus Jones
assetsGivenUp.tradeDescription: Acquired from Orlando Magic along with two future 2nd round picks for cash considerations
assetsGivenUp.note: Veteran point guard, acquired by Charlotte to immediately flip to Dallas
